verses.plain: Bless the LORD, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.

tokens.t: Bless the
, O my soul: and all that is within me,
his holy name.

verses.plain: Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits:

tokens.t: Bless the
, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits:

verses.plain: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases;

tokens.t: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases;

verses.plain: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;

tokens.t: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;

verses.plain: Who satisfieth thy mouth with good things; so that thy youth is renewed like the eagle’s.

tokens.t: Who satisfieth thy mouth with good
thy youth is renewed like the eagle’s.

verses.plain: The LORD executeth righteousness and judgment for all that are oppressed.

tokens.t: The
executeth righteousness and judgment for all that are oppressed.

verses.plain: He made known his ways unto Moses, his acts unto the children of Israel.

tokens.t: He made known his ways unto Moses, his acts unto the children of Israel.

verses.plain: The LORD is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.

tokens.t: The
merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.

verses.plain: He will not always chide: neither will he keep his anger for ever.

tokens.t: He will not always chide: neither will he keep
for ever.

verses.plain: He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities.

tokens.t: He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities.

verses.plain: For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him.

tokens.t: For as the heaven is high above the earth,
great is his mercy toward them that fear him.

verses.plain: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.

tokens.t: As far as the east is from the west,
far hath he removed our transgressions from us.

verses.plain: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him.

tokens.t: Like as a father pitieth
children,
the
pitieth them that fear him.

verses.plain: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.

tokens.t: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we
dust.

verses.plain: As for man, his days are as grass: as a flower of the field, so he flourisheth.

tokens.t: man, his days
as grass: as a flower of the field, so he flourisheth.

verses.plain: For the wind passeth over it, and it is gone; and the place thereof shall know it no more.

tokens.t: For the wind passeth over it, and it is gone; and the place thereof shall know it no more.

verses.plain: But the mercy of the LORD is from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him, and his righteousness unto children’s children;

tokens.t: But the mercy of the
from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him, and his righteousness unto children’s children;

verses.plain: To such as keep his covenant, and to those that remember his commandments to do them.

tokens.t: To such as keep his covenant, and to those that remember his commandments to do them.

verses.plain: The LORD hath prepared his throne in the heavens; and his kingdom ruleth over all.

tokens.t: The
hath prepared his throne in the heavens; and his kingdom ruleth over all.

verses.plain: Bless the LORD, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word.

tokens.t: Bless the
, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word.

verses.plain: Bless ye the LORD, all ye his hosts; ye ministers of his, that do his pleasure.

tokens.t: Bless ye the
, all
his hosts;
ministers of his, that do his pleasure.

verses.plain: Bless the LORD, all his works in all places of his dominion: bless the LORD, O my soul.

tokens.t: Bless the
, all his works in all places of his dominion: bless the
, O my soul.
